description:
Bag some peaks in backcountry boots purpose-made for snowboard mountaineering. The Aspect boot is stiff, responsive, and comfortable due to the combination of Endo 2.0 construction, the Boa® Conda™ system and the Intuition™ SpacerHeater™ liner. Steep gully climbs, approaches and scrambling are all made easier thanks to the outsoles and compatibility with crampons. Boots that can handle the climbing equally as well as the shredding are boots you need to meet.

  • Endo 2.0 construction uses a urethane endoskeletal structure to provide a durable flex that stays consistent through the life of the boot
  • Intuition SpaceHeater™ liner uses high-density foam for stiffness and comfort
  • Boa® Conda™ liner lacing can be adjusted on the fly from the outside of the boot to get the best possible heel lock
  • Time-tested leather upper offers rugged durability
  • Standard-style boot laces are built for the long run but can easily be replaced in the field
  • Power strap helps ensure you get the best fit and power transfer possible
  • 3D Formed dual-density EVA footbeds are comfortable straight out of the box
  • Vibram® Mountaineer outsoles provide all the grip you need to reach those alpine peaks before dropping in
  • Crampon-compatible, making steep couloirs and glacier approaches much easier
name: K2 Aspect Snowboard Boots - Men's
